zoomss 0.0.1
  • Get started
  • Reference

    Reference

    All functions

    GroupInputs

    Default functional groups for the ZooMSS model

    untibble()

    Convert tibble to data frame for efficiency

    zAveOutput()

    Calculate mean of final portion of ZooMSS time series

    zBiomass()

    Convert ZooMSS abundance matrices to biomass by multiplying by body weights

    zCalculatePhytoParam()

    Calculate phytoplankton abundance spectrum from chlorophyll data

    zCarbonBiomass()

    Convert ZooMSS abundances to carbon biomass across all size classes

    zConvert2Tibble()

    Convert ZooMSS list output to tibble with species names

    zCreateInputs()

    Create input parameters data frame for ZooMSS model runs

    zCreateSimpleTimeSeries()

    Generate synthetic environmental data for ZooMSS testing

    zExtractSizeRange()

    Extract specific size class range from abundance matrices

    zExtract_PPMR()

    Calculate predator-prey mass ratio data for visualization

    zGetGroups()

    Load default or custom functional groups for ZooMSS model

    zMakeDietTibble()

    Convert diet matrix to long format for analysis and visualization

    zPlotEnvironment()

    Plot environmental forcing data

    zPlot_AbundTimeSeries()

    Visualize abundance changes over time for each functional group

    zPlot_BiomassTimeSeries()

    Visualize biomass changes over time with multiple display options

    zPlot_GrowthTimeSeries()

    Visualize growth rate changes over time for each functional group

    zPlot_PPMR()

    Visualize predator-prey mass ratio patterns in ZooMSS results

    zPlot_PredTimeSeries()

    Visualize predation mortality changes over time for each functional group

    zPlot_SizeSpectra()

    Visualize abundance size spectra across functional groups

    zExtractBiomassSize()

    Sum biomass across functional groups for each size class

    zExtractBiomassSpecies()

    Sum biomass across size classes for each functional group

    zSpeciesCarbonBiomass()

    Convert abundances to carbon biomass and sum across size classes

    zExtractAllSum()

    Sum abundances across all groups and size classes

    zExtractSizeSum()

    Collection of helper functions for analyzing ZooMSS model outputs

    zExtractSpeciesSum()

    Aggregate ZooMSS abundances across all functional groups

    zExtractTrophicLevels()

    Compute trophic levels for functional groups using diet composition

    zValidateGroups()

    Validate ZooMSS functional groups data structure and values

    zoomss_model()

    Main ZooMSS model function for complete simulations

    zoomss_mvf()

    Solve McKendrick-von Foerster equation for size-structured populations

    zoomss_params()

    Initialize and validate ZooMSS model parameters

    zoomss_run()

    Execute the main ZooMSS simulation loop with dynamic environmental forcing

    zoomss_setup()

    Initialize ZooMSS model components and calculate feeding interactions
